import { useLocalStorage } from "react-use"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "./signin.css"; export default function Index() { const [login, setLogin] = useLocalStorage("login", false); const [username, setUsername] = useLocalStorage("username", ""); const [admin, setAdmin] = useLocalStorage("admin", false); useEffect(() => { if (login && !admin) location.href = "/"; }, []); return (
